mapper.select: SELECT board_id,version,subject,content,created_time,file_id,root_board_id FROM board ORDER BY created_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{noOfRecords};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM board WHERE board_id = #{board_id} AND version = #{version} ;
mapper.select: SELECT b.file_name, b.file_data, b.file_size FROM board as a JOIN file as b ON a.file_id = b.file_id WHERE board_id = #{board_id} AND version = #{version};
